Servants in Undeath

You arrive at the site of a recent battle between the forces of Araby and an unknown aggressor. Lying next to a particularly high pile of bodies, you find the corpse of a massive war elephant, multiple spears protruding from its grey skin. Surely it would be a waste to let such a magnificent creature rest.
Servants in Undeath

A herd of Beastmen attempts to ambush your forces as you pass through a canyon. Despite their ferocity, your legion is able to fend them off, sending what remains of the foul creatures back to their herdstone. Among the corpses of these beastly assailants are a group of larger creatures with massive horns. One of your necromancers seems overjoyed, exclaiming that our horned attackers may yet have a use for us.
Servants in Undeath

In front of you is the mouth of a large cave. Upon entering the cave, you are surprised to discover that this was once the lair of a dead hydra, its body in an advanced state of decay. This is truly a rare sight in this part of the world, and your mind races with the possibilities. It’s impossible to determine what could have felled the many-headed monster, but it would be best to make a decision before we find out.
Servants in Undeath

In the distance, you can see the ruins of a small village. As your forces march down the central road, you find the skeleton of a giant slumped up against the stone wall of a dilapidated dwelling. A ballista bolt has pinned the giant’s remains to the structure, but the bones are otherwise intact. You begin to think that perhaps the death of this colossal oaf was premature.
The Greatest Necromancer

You have served the Great Necromancer Nagash for millennia. Upon his return, you swore allegiance to him once again. But he was defeated once before, and your kingdom fell with him. Surely, together you could conquer the world and turn it into a Great Empire of the Dead. But it would be the realm of Nagash and not yours. Wouldn't it be better to rule yourselves?
You will recieve Morghast servants and a powerful buff after the Legions of Nagashizzar faction is defeated.
Overthrow Nagash

Only I shall rule! Why should I submit to this rotting husk? If you decide to forge your own empire, you will find yourself at war with Nagash. Eliminating his faction will will bestow the Supreme Lord of Undeath buff to the player.
Obey Nagash
A wise choice. Better to be a servant of Nagash than to be obliterated.
